definition: to tremble/to shake out/to reveal/to make it in the world

sentences.english: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations also of the hills moved and were shaken, because he was wroth.
sentences.chinese: 那時因他發怒，地就搖撼戰抖，山的根基也震動搖撼。

sentences.english: The frog is frightened at the sight of a snake.
sentences.chinese: 那隻青蛙因爲看到了蛇而戰抖。

sentences.english: 7The earth trembled and quaked, and the foundations of the mountains shook; they trembled because he was angry.
sentences.chinese: 那時因他發怒，地就搖撼戰抖，山的根基也震動搖撼。
